Title: When I offer my creative work:

AnswerList.Title: I never ask for money, but if someone offered a gift, I wouldn’t say no
I only charge for the cost of the materials
I charge for the cost of the materials, plus a little extra to cover additional costs e.g. cover costs for petrol, electricity, tools etc.
I charge much more than the cost of the materials and labour e.g. I cover my costs and make a profit
